title: Cleaning the barn
text: Cleaning the barn. We plan the day: planting, irrigation, and equipment checks. We rotate pastures to improve forage quality. We record yields and monitor feed intake. I check the crops to see if the plants are healthy. In the morning, I wake up early and walk to the fields. We sell fresh vegetables at the local market. I work on Green Valley Farm, and every day is busy. I talk to the team and assign tasks for the afternoon. I clean the barn after milking and store the tools. Farm safety rules are part of our routine.
